what-is-onboarding.question: What is the onboarding process?
what-is-onboarding.answer:
When you first join, we guide you through setting up your account:
1. Create your account and verify email
2. Complete your Personal Info (birth date, time, location)
3. Set up a payment method
4. Choose a subscription plan

This ensures you get the full experience from day one.

can-skip-onboarding.question: Can I skip the onboarding process?
can-skip-onboarding.answer: Yes, you can skip onboarding steps, but you'll need to complete your Personal Info and subscribe to access all features. You can always return to complete these steps later from the main menu.

what-is-horoscope.question: What is a horoscope?
what-is-horoscope.answer:
A horoscope is a forecast of astrological influences for a specific time period. Our app provides:
• Daily horoscopes (updated each day)
• Weekly horoscopes (updated each week)
• Monthly horoscopes (updated each month)

They show planetary movements and their potential influence on different aspects of your life like love, career, and health.

view-horoscope.question: How do I view my horoscope?
view-horoscope.answer:
To view your horoscope:
1. Go to the Horoscope page
2. Your daily horoscope appears automatically (based on your sun sign)
3. You can also view weekly and monthly horoscopes
4. Each reading includes insights for love, career, health, and general guidance

horoscope-accuracy.question: How accurate are horoscopes?
horoscope-accuracy.answer: Horoscopes are meant to be insightful and thought-provoking rather than predictive guarantees. They offer general guidance based on planetary positions. For more personalized insights, use your full birth chart analysis or chat with the psychic AI.

different-signs.question: Can I read horoscopes for other signs?
different-signs.answer:
Currently, the app shows horoscopes based on your sun sign. For insights on other signs (moon sign, rising sign, etc.), you can:
• Read the moon sign horoscope interpretations in your birth chart
• Ask the psychic AI for insights on specific signs
• Contact support if you'd like this feature expanded

moon-phase-meaning.question: What is the moon phase and why does it matter?
moon-phase-meaning.answer:
The moon phase shows where the moon is in its cycle (New Moon, Waxing, Full Moon, Waning). The moon affects:
• Emotions and intuition
• Energy levels
• Timing for new projects (new moon) or completion (full moon)
• Sleep and creativity

Understanding the current moon phase helps you align your activities with lunar energy.

moon-phase-today.question: How do I check the current moon phase?
moon-phase-today.answer:
Go to the Moon Phase page to see:
• Current moon phase with visual representation
• Percentage illumination
• Days until next full/new moon
• Astrological significance
• Guidance for current lunar energy

cosmic-weather.question: What is Cosmic Weather?
cosmic-weather.answer:
Cosmic Weather shows the current positions of planets and their astrological influence on each day. It tells you:
• Which planets are most active today
• Current astrological aspects
• Energy forecast
• Best times for different activities
• Overall daily cosmic energy

use-cosmic-weather.question: How do I use Cosmic Weather information?
use-cosmic-weather.answer:
Use Cosmic Weather to:
• Understand current planetary influences
• Know when Mercury Retrograde or other major events are happening
• Time new projects, meetings, or personal goals
• Gain insight into general daily energy

change-language.question: How do I change the app language?
change-language.answer:
To change your language:
1. Go to Preferences page
2. Select your preferred language
3. Available languages include:
   • English
   • Spanish (including regional dialects)
   • French (including regional dialects)
   • German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese

The app will automatically translate all content to your selected language.

oracle-response-type.question: What are Full and Brief response types?
oracle-response-type.answer:
You can customize how the psychic oracle responds:
• Full Responses: Detailed, in-depth answers with context and explanations
• Brief Responses: Concise, direct answers for quick guidance

Go to Preferences to set your preferred response type.

voice-settings.question: Can I enable voice responses?
voice-settings.answer:
Yes! The app supports voice responses:
1. Go to Preferences → Voice Settings
2. Enable voice responses
3. Choose from 4 different voice options
4. Adjust voice settings to your preference

The psychic's responses will be read aloud in your chosen voice.
